email.title: Verification Code
email.instruction: You are verifying your identity. Here is your verification code:
email.valid_for: Verification code is valid for 10 minutes
email.security_content: Do not share this code with anyone, including those claiming to be customer service. The code is valid for 10 minutes.
email.ignore_message: If this is not your action, please ignore this email.
email.auto_send_notice: This email is sent automatically, please do not reply
email.subject: Verification Code Login
